This uneven saturation often overwhelms drainfields that had been functioning normally, causing sudden backups.

Fix Septic Now maintains fully equipped service trucks positioned to serve Canton and surrounding Van Zandt County communities with minimal response times. faqs.question: Is a septic backup dangerous in Canton?
faqs.answer: Yes, sewage backups pose serious health risks including exposure to harmful bacteria, viruses, and parasites. If sewage enters your Canton home, avoid contact, keep children and pets away, stop all water usage, and call us immediately. We also recommend contacting your county health department for contamination guidance.
